ResumeParserData.Summary: A dedicated Product Manager with 30 years of experience in the UK banking industry. Michael Brown has worked with numerous top-tier banks, driving product innovation and improving customer satisfaction. His background in mathematics and strategic approach to product management have consistently delivered outstanding business results. Michael is now seeking to bring his expertise to a forward-thinking organization.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Michael has an experience in the domain of 'Management of Companies and Enterprises', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Marketing and Sales Managers. 'The candidate has a total experience of 30 YearsThe candidate has been working as a Product Manager at HSBC for the last 8.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Michael holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at HSBC. from 01/01/2016 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 8.7 years in this company.

Michael holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Barclays Bank. from 01/01/2010 to 31/12/2016. The candidate has a total experience of 7.0 years in this company.

Michael holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Lloyds Bank. from 01/01/2004 to 31/12/2010. The candidate has a total experience of 7.0 years in this company.

Michael holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Royal Bank of Scotland. from 01/01/1998 to 31/12/2004. The candidate has a total experience of 7.0 years in this company.

ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
Michael Brown
Address : 67 Oak Avenue, Manchester, England
Email : michael.brown@example.com
Phone : 07987 654321

Personal Statement
A dedicated Product Manager with 30 years of experience in the UK banking industry. Michael Brown has worked with numerous top-tier banks, driving product innovation and improving customer satisfaction. His background in mathematics and strategic approach to product management have consistently delivered outstanding business results. Michael is now seeking to bring his expertise to a forward-thinking organization.

Education History
University of Bristol (Russell Group) 
BSc Mathematics
Graduated : 1994

Work History
Product Manager	,HSBC
Manchester, UK	,2016 - Present
Spearheaded the development of new financial products, leading to a 30% increase in market penetration.
Coordinated with IT and marketing departments to ensure seamless product integration and launch.
Product Manager	,Barclays Bank
Manchester, UK	,2010 - 2016
Managed a diverse product portfolio, resulting in a 20% growth in revenue.
Conducted in-depth market analysis to guide product development strategies.
Product Manager	,Lloyds Bank
Manchester, UK	,2004 - 2010
Led teams in the creation and launch of innovative banking products, achieving high customer satisfaction ratings.
Utilized customer feedback to continuously improve product offerings.
Product Manager	,Royal Bank of Scotland
Manchester, UK	,1998 - 2004
Directed product lifecycle from ideation to launch, ensuring alignment with market needs.
Fostered strong relationships with stakeholders to support product success.
Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK	,1994 - 1998
Held multiple positions across top UK banks, gaining comprehensive experience in product management.

Skills
Product Lifecycle Management
Market Trend Analysis
Cross-functional Team Leadership
Customer-Centric Product Design
Strategic Planning and Execution

Qualifications
Certified Product Manager (CPM) 
PRINCE2 Practitioner
Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) 
Six Sigma Green Belt
Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) 

Personal Hobbies
Hiking : Enjoy exploring nature trails and national parks.
Chess : Active participant in local chess clubs and tournaments.
Writing : Passion for writing articles on financial trends and product management.
Cooking : Love creating and experimenting with international cuisines.
Community Service : Volunteer at local shelters and community centers.

AMS - Confidential

AMS - Confidential
